Text:
hi there, well i am writing this here cause i need your help. you uploaded a torrent named contemporary masters of photography. well i am not able to download it. it shows an Error: File exceed filesystem size limit. can you please help me by sending Demonoid torrent, cause registration on that site are closed. 
or is there any way to fix this. 
thanks a lot
you can mail me at forate78 at gmail dot com
Hello dohduhdah, you should also download your files on a one-click host like rapi_dshare, hotf_ile, medi_afire,etc so you fans can have more options of downloading your stuff. Thank you.
Forate78, have you tried downloading the file with utorrent or vuze? Either one of those bittorrent clients should work. On demonoid that torrent is split up in 9 parts and not well-seeded.
64146495, I prefer to share stuff via bittorrent as it's more convenient and downloaders share data while downloading (which allows for more efficient downloading).
Thanks for all the awesome lectures. One of these days I'm going to find something equally cool to upload and add to the swarm, but in the meantime I greatly appreciate your work.
